dict.string: You're using git? Man, version control will just slow you down, you should stop using version control and just use a shared folder
Dropbox will totally work!
A team member accidentally overwrites your project's shared folder with pictures of their cat! Sucks to be you!
No, love the git and it will love you back
A disaster has been averted
Hey guys, I think our concept is too limited. We should really convert this into an MMORPG.
I mean, how hard can it be?
Nobody on your team has the faintest idea how multiplayer networking works, this idea goes nowhere.
Nope
A disaster has been averted
I don't understand this theme, we should just reuse last year's game and put the new name on it.
Where is the Jam Spirit?
Winners don't cheat! Type faster!
Our old game was super cool! No one will even notice
There are no comments in your old code and all your method names are incomprehensible garbage. Most of the art remained with the artist who died of autoeroticasphyxiation months earlier.
Fuck this game library, we should switch to unity!
Unity Wooooo!
GREY SCREEN
Nope
A disaster has been averted.
Should we track tasks with a tool like JIRA, or just use sticky notes?
Sticky notes!
SCRUMMASTER POWER UP! AGILE AS FUCK!!!
JIRA!
Dawn breaks in Australia and JIRA goes down for maintenence.
Oh crap we don't have any art, and It's so hard to find good art with an open license, let's just copy shit off tumblr
Who even draws? Lets do it
You steal from an artist who happens to be working with another team. They beat you up and take your shoes
No
opengameart.org, duh
For dinner, should we go to Jerusalem's or just get some gas station burritos?
Jerusalem's
Your team is well fed and ready to go!
Gas station
Bob has died of dysentery.
I think we're ahead of schedule, let's go party with some undergrads!
YES
Bob makes a pass at the underage sister of a left defenseman. Three of Bob's fingers are broken
NO
It wouldn't have been any fun anyway. These punks can't hold their liquor.

I'm really worried about the fructose in apples and so forth so want to make a substitute. I was thinking of mixing glucose, artificial apple flavoring, and some kind of non-nutritive fibrous substrate together. Then shaping it into apple shapes and letting it set and then dig in :) but I'm not sure which fiber to choose? I was thinking celery pulp? And how long to dry out to let it set? Thanks!
Celery Pulp
I think we need more coffee. Also, WTF?
Denim
What the actual fuck? I think we need more coffee
